rows.label: xs08160100_MSG0001
rows.name:
Sorry... While we were away,
they snatched it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08160100_MSG0002
rows.name: The city was invaded. It couldn't be helped.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08160100_MSG0003
rows.name: Let's just be glad the damage wasn't worse.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08160100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Why were they so fixated
on that Doll, anyway?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08160100_MSG0008
rows.name:
(Why did they know that that mech
had been recovered by us?)[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08160100_MSG0009
rows.name:
(And how did they know
it was being stored here...?)[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]
